text.more:
This graph represent the result of a qualitive analysis (content analysis of 52 mindmaps representing PLE).
Content analysis is based on presence (or not) of indicators allowing to identify states of consciousness of Learning Strategies (11 items in 4 categories : Cognitive, Metacognitive, Affective and Resources), Self-Efficacy (8 items) and Motivation (1 items).
Nodes sizes depend on percent of total presence of variables and indicators.
Some edges weights also depend on percent of presence of variables.
The whole graph is under ForceAtlas layout which allow to spatialize Small-World / Scale free networks.
It is focused on quality for exploring data and allow a rigourous interpretation of the graph.
In this case, it allows us to identify communities based on their state of consciousness of some psychological variables through their own representation of a Personal Learning Environment (PLE).

text.title: PLE Analysis

legend.nodeLabel: Psychological variables (related to Learning Strategies, Self-Efficacy and Motivation) and observations about each mindmap regarding its community (C1 or C2)
